subsection.name: Installing and configuring EGE web package - Apache Tomcat
subsection.p: Step 1 : Download the Servlet/JSP container Apache Tomcat (version 5.5 and 6.x supported) from this page - Apache Tomcat and install it. Or install it through another method depending upon your operating system.
Step 2 : Unzip the downloaded ege-webapp.zip. Copy both "ege-webservice" and "ege-webclient" directories into the 'APACHE_TOCMAT_HOME/webapps/' folder.
Step 3 : Configure the EGE web client - instructions can be found at : Download the EGE web client
Step 4 : Start Apache Tomcat from command line by typing 'startup' from the 'APACHE_TOMCAT_HOME/bin/' folder.

Step 5 : Run the EGE RESTful client application in your browser by going to the following URL: http://localhost:[port]/ege-webclient/, where [port] is your configured tomcat HTTP port (8080 by default).
